article_title: Employees Forgo Wellness Cash Incentives Worth Millions

article_metadata.author: Ashlea Ebeling

og.description: The EEOC is poised to release proposed guidance on workplace wellness programs as employers are shelling out more than ever in cash incentives and employees are leaving cash on the table.
